TextLibrary.Text: While we were asleep Trident left us a message telling us to meet them on Aries Prime. They claim to have a PSI-Weapon but mentioned we should not be too friendly with the Plasmids.
While we were asleep Trident left us a message telling us to meet them on Aries Prime. They claim to have a PSI-Weapon but mentioned we should not be too friendly with the Plasmids.
